paper_abstract: The coupled nonlinear Schrodinger equation models several interesting physical phenomena presents a model equation for optical fiber with linear birefringence. In this paper we derive a finite element scheme to solve this equation, we test this method for stability and accuracy, many numerical tests have been conducted. The scheme is quite accurate and describe the interaction picture clearly. (C) 2007 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Numerical solution of coupled nonlinear Schrodinger equation by Galerkin method
